Name: Knight-Errant's Essentials
AttributesDescription: Grants 34% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription:
Prepared by Cartethyia herself, this Laurus Salad comes packed with extra Viscum Berries, crispy and sweet.
Now a wandering knight, she's hungry to learn, to grow, and to see the world.
Let's start with a salad made just for the wandering knight. This time, extra berries included!
ObtainedShowDescription: Grants 34% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
